quote: There's a reason prophets perform miracles: language lacks the power to describe faith. And you have to land on faith before you can even begin to hike around to its flip side, betrayal.
quote_letters: THERES A REASON PROPHETS PERFORM MIRACLES LANGUAGE LACKS THE POWER TO DESCRIBE FAITH AND YOU HAVE TO LAND ON FAITH BEFORE YOU CAN EVEN BEGIN TO HIKE AROUND TO ITS FLIP SIDE BETRAYAL
